thread.title: Obama EPA Correct About Deadly PM 2.5 Pollutants

author: wsjcom
title: Obama EPA Correct About Deadly PM 2.5 Pollutants
text:
Regarding Steve Milloy’s “The EPA Cleans Up Its Science” (op-ed, March 27) and the letters of March 31 in response: Lawyer Steve Milloy concludes with the line: “In the meantime, we have science in the sunshine,” referring to a colleague’s recent unpublished study from California that found that PM 2.5 micron air pollutants aren’t associated with mortality.
This—along with complaints of inaccessibility of so-called “secret science” studies of PM 2.5 health effects—serves as the author’s grounds for supporting EPA Administrator...
